interval.description: Duration of ticks to wait between applying exhaustion.
interval.markdownDescription: Duration of ticks to wait between applying exhaustion.

exhaustion.description: How much exhaustion will be applied each interval.
exhaustion.markdownDescription: How much exhaustion will be applied each interval.

type.description:
## Exhaust

---


[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/exhaust)

Applies exhaustion to the player over time.

Type ID: `origins:exhaust`

---

### Examples

```json
{
  	"type": "origins:exhaust",
  	"interval": 20,
  	"exhaustion": 4.0,
	"condition": {
		"type": "origins:fluid_height",
		"fluid": "minecraft:water",
		"comparison": ">",
		"compare_to": 0.0
	}
}
```

This example will apply 4.0 exhaustion to the player if the player is touching water.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Exhaust (Power Type) date: 2021-04-08

Exhaust

Power Type

Applies exhaustion to the player over time.

Type ID: origins:exhaust

Fields

Field Type Default Description
interval Integer 20 Duration of ticks to wait between applying exhaustion.
exhaustion Float How much exhaustion will be applied each interval.

Examples

{
  	"type": "origins:exhaust",
  	"interval": 20,
  	"exhaustion": 4.0,
	"condition": {
		"type": "origins:fluid_height",
		"fluid": "minecraft:water",
		"comparison": ">",
		"compare_to": 0.0
	}
}

This example will apply 4.0 exhaustion to the player if the player is touching water.
